item.title: Library Legislation Updates to Begin 2026
item.description: Catch up on the latest in library legislation from across the country, as well as be inspired to take action against censorship this year.

item.title: Top Secrets: 6 Thrillers About Secrets and Lies
item.description: When you've got a secret, you've got a promise off M-E-S-S. Read your way into these compelling thrillers about secrets and lies.

item.title: Repetitive Observation: The Fascination of Fens, Bogs, & Swamps
item.description: This book about fens, bogs, and swamps will open your eyes not only to these fascinating environments, but it will encourage a practice of observation...

item.title: Horror Retellings That Will Scare You All Over Again
item.description: If you've ever read a classic and thought you would like it were it a bit scarier, then these horror retellings will be up your alley.

item.title: The Generational Impact of Book Bans on Teens: Book Censorship News, January 23, 2026
item.description: For generations, the research has been clear: young people read more and do better in school when they aren't subject to book bans.
